name: prefab-editor-tools
description: Tooling for Prefab Config, Feature flags, and Log Levels
author: Jeffrey Chupp

prefab.apiKey.description: Your personal API key for Prefab

prefab.optIn.extractString.description: Prompt to extract strings to config

scripts.compile: esbuild ./client/src/extension.ts --minify --bundle --outfile=client/out/extension.js --external:vscode --format=cjs --platform=node && esbuild ./server/src/server.ts --minify --bundle --outfile=server/out/server.js --external:vscode --format=cjs --platform=node && echo '#! /usr/bin/env node' > server/out/cli && cat server/out/server.js >> server/out/cli
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
